Refinery Jax Beach Restaurant » Tridence Blog Jacksonville & Chicago Facebook Instagram TikTok Twitter Youtube Home Brands Tech today Metaverse Theatre / Broadway Spiritual Travel Tridence Agency News Search Facebook Instagram TikTok Twitter Youtube Tridence Blog Jacksonville & Chicago Home Brands Tech today Metaverse Theatre / Broadway Spiritual Travel Tridence Agency News Home Travel Jacksonville Refinery Jax Beach Restaurant Travel Jacksonville Refinery Jax Beach Restaurant By David Vega - Modified date: 09/17/2022 Facebook Twitter Pinterest WhatsApp Linkedin ReddIt Tumblr Telegram Copy URL The newest Jacksonville Beach restaurant and bar complex at 831 First Street North is open to the general public. Refinery Jax Beach is a fabulous foodie community that offers Refined Dining, an upscale restaurant overlooking the ocean from the second-floor dining room, a more casual First Street Pub on the 1st floor that offers more casual dining and drinks, and the ocean bar that provides refreshments to those walking up from the beach. In addition, The Market and Lounge offers drinks and products for sale. “I am also hoping that the residents will like the place, because not only can they grab something to-go without driving anywhere … They can always go and get some delicious scratch-made breakfast, lunch, and dinner options,” Vera Duren. The restaurant’s upper story will offer fine dining, Duren says, and the downstairs space along First Street will serve breakfast, lunch, and dinner in a more casual setting. The market will sell beer, wine, cheese, sandwiches, and healthier on-the-go snacks. “We want to capture a lot of healthier options. I love quality foods, and I think that area needs a little better than it used to be,” she added. Refinery Jax Beach is just what people at the Beaches and across Jacksonville have needed for some time. Another great addition to the beach community. As the head of Tridence, a top-rated Jacksonville digital and marketing agency, he has earned a reputation and awards of excellence.

Through his engaging blog columns, David shares actionable insights, the latest industry trends, and practical tips designed to keep readers ahead in the fast-paced digital world. His unique approach, which seamlessly integrates AI tools, offers readers a rich, comprehensive, and forward-thinking perspective on digital marketing. Follow David Vega for expert advice and cutting-edge strategies that drive success in the ever-evolving digital landscape. Refinery Restaurant - About Skip to Main Content Menu Drinks private Parties Inquire about parties Gallery Reserve Events Jobs Contact Us About Gift Cards Press & News Go to top Facebook page Instagram page Yelp page Toggle navigation Facebook page Instagram page Yelp page Menu Drinks private Parties Inquire about parties Gallery Reserve Events Jobs Contact Us About Gift Cards Press & News REFINERY JAX BEACH Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 slideshow start stop playing REFINERY JAX BEACH MORE THAN JUST A RESTAURANT - AN EXPERIENCE Whatever you're seeking, there's something for everyone and every taste at Refinery. We craft fresh, flavorful, chef-inspired cuisine and offer a variety of tasty options to suit most any palette. Whether catching a quick bite at the ocean bar, or dining upstairs with a breathtaking ocean view for that special occasion, or getting pull from one of our 20 tabs while enjoying live entertainment at the lounge, Refinery is Jacksonville Beach's neighborhood gathering place for friends, good times, outstanding service, and really 'fine' fare. Lounge The Lounge at Refinery offers live music and variety of fun events, as well as our signature craft cocktails, great selection of beers and wines, pub & refined dining menu. Events Ocean Bar Ocean bar offers cool ocean breezes and convenient beach access for the romantic walks along the sands and surf. We offer our full menu (pub & refined dining), as well as our signature frozen cocktails and mocktails. Refined Dining Reserve your table for the finest oceanfront dining Jax Beach has to offer. Combining an incredible ocean view with delectable, Euro-American inspired cuisine nothing says special quite like Refinery. Our Chef's specialty menu is crafted using only the freshest, seasonal ingredients, made from scratch breads and savory signature sauces for a tastefully satisfying experience you'll return for again and again. Refinery promises delicious fare, an elegant ambient atmosphere and outstanding service creating a unique dining experience you are destined to remember. Join us Tuesday through Sunday for dinner. First Street Pub The 1st Street Pub is Refinery's meet-up place to grab a pull from one of the 20 taps or our signature cocktails, as guests await friends or sit to catch the game. Whether seated inside or enjoying the 170-degree views of 1st Street from the patio, you won't miss a beat as you nosh on delicious, chef-inspired favorites including Euro-American specialty dishes, hand-held sandwiches, and shareable appetizers as you gaze out at the passersby cruising the strip. With great offers from our both menues, pub & refined dining, pub is the perfect place to sip and nosh. Contact us: by phone (904)-746-3503, by email refinery@refineryjaxbeach.com Reserve Parties Jobs
